fields.body:
Hi {{ content_object.user.first_name }},

We can tell you’re really dedicated to making your community cleaner! You recently committed to {{ content_object.action }} by {{ content_object.date_committed|date }}. {% with content_object.other_commitments as other_commitments %} {% if other_commitments %} Remember, you’ve also committed to complete some other actions: {% for uap in other_commitments %}

  • {{ uap.action }} by {{ uap.date_committed|date }}
    • {% endfor %} {% endif %} {% endwith %}

    The annual energy savings from these actions are equivalent to diverting {{ content_object.user.get_profile.potential_points }} pounds of coal from a power plant.

    You can start saving energy right away by completing these actions. If you get stuck, try reviewing the action page or asking a question in the action comments. Other users will be happy to help!

    Keep up the good work!

    Cheers,
    The Repower at Home Team
fields.name: Right after you make a commitment
fields.subject: Your latest Repower at Home commitment

fields.body:
Hi {{ content_object.user.first_name }},

The due date for your commitment is approaching! By {{ content_object.date_committed }} you committed to {{ content_object.action }}.

The annual energy savings from this action is equivalent to diverting {{ content_object.action.points }} pounds of coal from a power plant.

We can’t wait to add your impact to our goal of saving the equivalent of one million pounds of coal by October 10th. Let us know when you’re finished by following the link above and marking the action to done.

Cheers,
The Repower at Home Team
fields.name: 1 week before commitment due
fields.subject: Your Repower at Home commitments are due soon!

fields.body:
Hi {{ content_object.user.first_name }},

You committed to {{ content_object.action }} by today.

It's time to report on your progress. Follow the link above and click the “I did this!” link on the action page. If you need more time, you can also update your commitment from the action page.

Cheers,
Repower at Home
fields.name: Day before commitment is due
fields.subject: DUE TODAY: Your Repower at Home commitments
